channel.title: Some simple newb help
channel.description: Well lol, I have my own server (new to server building), and it works + running right now. But, I want to edit some files such as client.java, player.java, npc.java, and NPChandler.java. Well why these files? Is probably what you're thinking. I'm trying to add the Jad Mini-Game to my server (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,93492.0.html) so for example, in the client.java file, do I put it anywhere? Or at the end of a command? And I need to know EXACTLY where to put the coding. Thanks if you guys can help me out.

item.title: Some simple newb help
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Well lol, I have my own server (new to server building), and it works + running right now. But, I want to edit some files such as client.java, player.java, npc.java, and NPChandler.java. Well why these files? Is probably what you’re thinking. I’m trying to add the Jad Mini-Game to my server (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,93492.0.html) so for example, in the client.java file, do I put it anywhere? Or at the end of a command? And I need to know EXACTLY where to put the coding. Thanks if you guys can help me out.
